commits.name: Commit-0
commits.content:
local colors = require("colors")

-- Equivalent to the --bar domain
sbar.bar({
  topmost = "window",
  height = 38,
  color = colors.bar.bg,
  padding_right = 2,
  padding_left = 2,
})
